title: Adobe Campaign ExperienceEvent - Profile Snapshot Preferences Details
description: Adobe Campaign ExperienceEvent optional snapshot of Profile preferences details.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/campaign.title: A single message sent to a recipient.

xdm:profileSnapshot.title: Profile Snapshot
xdm:profileSnapshot.description: Profile Snapshot contains the recipient of the message. This property is primarily used to link the message to a Profile using the `IdentityMap` but it can also be used to freeze some properties of the profile at the time the message was sent.

xdm:preferredLanguage.title: Preferred Language
xdm:preferredLanguage.description: Describes the preferred system of communication used by the profile. Language codes are expressed in BCP 47 format.

xdm:emailFormat.title: Email Format
xdm:emailFormat.description: Email format preferred by the profile. This can be rich text/plain text

xdm:timeZone.title: Time Zone
xdm:timeZone.description: Describes which time zone the profile is present in, most frequently/the time zone preferred by the profile. Time zones are expressed according to the IETF tz database: https://www.ietf.org/timezones/tzdb-2016i/tz-link.htm

xdm:optInOut.title: OptInOut
xdm:optInOut.description: Describes a users opting in and out preferences for communication by medium and communication type.
